about_the_game:
Challenge your limits in this fast-paced, multiplayer action game where chaos meets fun! Players face off in different game modes to defeat each other and rise to the top. Whether you fight alone or make strategic moves with your teammates, this game will keep you on your toes at every moment.


In this classic free-for-all mode, players compete against each other to score the most kills within a time limit. Each player starts with basic equipment and can pick up better weapons and power-ups scattered around the arena. The player with the highest number of kills at the end of the match wins.


Players must survive waves of zombie attacks, either solo or in a team. As the game progresses, the zombies become more challenging, requiring players to strategize and use their resources wisely. The goal is to withstand as many waves as possible before being overrun.


A fun and casual game mode where players engage in a snowball fight. Armed with unlimited snowballs, players try to freeze each other. The objective is to hit as many opponents as possible and avoid getting hit yourself while running away from killer blocks!


In this cooperative mode, players team up to take down a powerful boss character. Players must work together, combining their skills and tactics to defeat the boss. The match ends when the boss is defeated.


A skill-based mode focused on navigating challenging obstacle courses as quickly as possible. Players must use precise timing and agility to overcome various obstacles like moving platforms, spikes, and gaps. The objective is to reach the finish line in the shortest time, with leaderboards tracking the fastest runs.


You Can Build Your Custom Maps!
With in game editor, you can create, save or load maps! You can play in custom map with your friends!

In this dynamic arena filled with diverse game modes, danger lurks around every corner, and surprises await at every turn. Arm yourself, sharpen your reflexes, and take on your rivals. This game rewards quick thinking and split-second decisions; all that's left is to survive and outplay your opponents.

Do you love chaos? If the best way to relax is to dive into a whirlwind of madness, this game is perfect for you. In a world where competition and action reach their peak, where endless fun and adrenaline-filled moments await, take your place and show other players who you are!

content_descriptors.notes: There is cartoonish blood effect is present in almost every aspect of the game.
